metadata.title: CVE-2020-36317 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In the standard library in Rust before 1.49.0, String::retain() function has a panic safety problem. It allows creation of a non-UTF-8 Rust string when the provided closure panics. This bug could result in a memory safety violation when other string APIs assume that UTF-8 encoding is used on the same string.

criterions.comment: rustc package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
